thread.title: Justin Bieber was the big winner at the MTV EMAs
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber was the big winner at the MTV EMAs

title: Justin Bieber was the big winner at the MTV EMAs
text:
Justin Bieber was the big winner at the MTV EMAs Justin Bieber's comeback year continued at Sunday's MTV Europe Music Awards, where the singer took home five prizes, including Best Male Performer, Biggest Fans and Best Worldwide Act (North America). More >> Justin Bieber's comeback year continued at Sunday's MTV Europe Music Awards, where the singer took home five prizes, including Best Male Performer, Biggest Fans and Best Worldwide Act (North America). More >> Evangeline Lilly and her longtime boyfriend Norman Kali have welcomed their second child, People reports. More >> Evangeline Lilly and her longtime boyfriend Norman Kali have welcomed their second child, People reports. More >> Justin Bieber dropped his new single "Sorry" on Thursday and it's pretty great. More >> Justin Bieber dropped his new single "Sorry" on Thursday and it's pretty great. More >> Cee Lo Green and his longtime girlfriend Shani James are engaged, People reports. More >> Cee Lo Green and his longtime girlfriend Shani James are engaged, People reports. More >> 
By Liz Raftery, 
Justin Bieber 's comeback year continued at Sunday's MTV Europe Music Awards, where the singer took home five prizes, including Best Male Performer, Biggest Fans and Best Worldwide Act (North America). 
Bieber also performed his song "What Do You Mean?" at the show, which was held at the Mediolanum Forum in Milan. 
Ed Sheeran , who hosted the show along with Ruby Rose , won awards for Best Live Act and Best World Stage (at the U.K.'s V Festival last year). 
Fall TV Popularity Contest: Which new shows won you over? Vote now! 
Other winners included Taylor Swift , who won Best Song for her version of "Bad Blood" featuring Kendrick Lamar ; One Direction , who took home the Best Pop prize; and Rihanna , who was named Best Female Performer. 
Nicki Minaj received the Best Hip Hop award, while the Best Rock award went to Coldplay and Shawn Mendes was named Best New Artist. 
Check out a complete list of winners here .
